content:
[file:plan.md] # Soulfield OS ‚Äî Project Plan

## üåå Vision
Soulfield OS is a **modular council of agents** orchestrated by **Aiden** (the coordinator).  
The system must be:
- **Extensible** ‚Äì new agents, workflows, integrations can be added anytime.
- **Persistent** ‚Äì tag-based memory survives reinstalls/migrations.
- **Aligned** ‚Äì every addition must serve this vision and pass structural checks.

## ‚öñÔ∏è Principles
1) This file is the **one plan**. No parallel visions.  
2) Every proposal must pass alignment (coherence, rights-preserving, non-simulation).  
3) Roles are clear and swappable; implementation is modular.  
4) Truth over convenience: verifiable, auditable, portable.

## üß© Core Council
- **Aiden** ‚Äî coordinator, speaks to user, routes tasks. `#council #core`
- **Archivist** ‚Äî memory (JSON now; Pinecone later). `#memory`
- **Builder** ‚Äî code scaffolding, workflows, automation. `#execution`
- **Watcher** ‚Äî contradiction & policy watchdog. `#governance`
- **Scout** ‚Äî research & external know
